mapper.sql: EQUIPMENT_ID, EQUIPMENT_NAME, USER_NAME, USER_ID, ICON, REGION, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(EQUIPMENT_ID) FROM hq_equipment_param WHERE EQUIPMENT_ID = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from hq_equipment_info where 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into hq_equipment_info (EQUIPMENT_ID, EQUIPMENT_NAME, USER_NAME, USER_ID, ICON, REGION, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update hq_equipment_info
EQUIPMENT_NAME = #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where EQUIPMENT_ID = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update hq_equipment_info set EQUIPMENT_NAME = #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGION = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where EQUIPMENT_ID = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
